snippet: The social conservative leader will endorse Rick Santorum for president during a visit to South Carolina on Sunday.
abstract: The social conservative leader will endorse Rick Santorum for president during a visit to South Carolina on Sunday.
lead_paragraph: MANCHESTER, N.H. - Gary Bauer, a social conservative leader and former Republican presidential hopeful, said that he will endorse Rick Santorum's bid for the party's presidential nomination during a visit to South Carolina on Sunday.

headline.main: Gary Bauer Says He Will Endorse Santorum
